title: Ep 56: Royally Organized with Elizabeth Holmes
itunes:title: Ep 56: Royally Organized with Elizabeth Holmes
itunes:subtitle: This week, Doree and Kate share their favorite tips for time management and staying organized. Plus, Kate talks healing her bod in 2019 and Doree prepares to clean out her “cabinet of doom.”Then they welcome Elizabeth Holmes, multimedia reporter, roya...
description:
This week, Doree and Kate share their favorite tips for time management and staying organized. Plus, Kate talks healing her bod in 2019 and Doree prepares to clean out her “cabinet of doom.”

Then they welcome Elizabeth Holmes, multimedia reporter, royal family expert, and creator of the viral Instagram Stories series So Many Thoughts. She discusses how she became a “Royals Enthusiast,” fandom as self-care, and her IVF journey.

Follow us on Instagram: @Forever35podcast,@katespencer,@doree, Twitter:@forever35pod, and in ourFacebook group(password is "serums"). All products mentioned on the show can be found on our website,Forever35podcast.com. To leave us a voicemail, call 781-591-0390, or you can email us at forever35podcast@gmail.com.


This episode is sponsored by:

  • Skillshare - Visit skillshare.com/forever35 to get two months of unlimited access to Skillshare’s classes.
  • Honeybook - Get 50% off your first year of Honeybook! Visit honeybook.com/forever35 and enter promo code forever35.
  • Thrive Market - Visit thrivemarket.com/forever35 to get 25% off your first order.
  • LiquidIV - Get 20% off on anything at liquid-iv.com with promo code forever35.
  • Calm - Get 25% a Calm Premium subscription! Visit calm.com/forever35.


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
